name="processResponse" type="tns:processResponse"/> <xs:element name="retailer" type="tns:retailer"/> <xs:complexType name="process"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="request" type="tns:retailerInput"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="retailerInput"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="list_transactions"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:retailerInput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="retailers"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="identifier" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="process_payments"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:retailerInput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="payments"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="item" type="tns:payment_item"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="payment_item"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="amount" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element name="card_number" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="customer_name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="retailer_identifier" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="processResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="result" type="tns:jobResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="jobResult"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="admin_info"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:jobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="contents" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="retailer"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:jobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="address" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="transactions"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="transaction" type="tns:transaction"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="transaction"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="transaction_amount" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="card_number" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="customer_info" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="transaction_status" type="tns:status"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="retailer" type="xs:IDREF"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="list_of_retailers"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:jobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="retailers"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="retailer_id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="list_of_information"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:jobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="data"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="information" type="tns:admin_info"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="list_of_transactions"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:jobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="transaction" type="tns:transaction"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="status"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="PROCESSING"/> <xs:enumeration value="APPROVED"/> <xs:enumeration value="DECLINED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/payment/doc" xmlns:tns="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/payment/doc"> <xsd:element name="BadJobFault" type="tns:BadJobFault"/> <xsd:complexType name="BadJobFault"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message
